name: Eighty/20 Results - Single Use Trial Memberships for Paid Memberships Pro
author: Thomas Sjolshagen <thomas@eighty20results.com>

sections.description: Only allow a Paid Memberships Pro member to sign up for a trial membership level once.
sections.changelog:
2.3

  1. REFACTOR: Remove submodule and add Utilities as subtree instead
  2. REFACTOR: Namespace clarity
  3. ENH: Adding CircleCI assets
  4. ENH: Adding a couple of unittests
  5. ENH: Updated .gitattributes and .gitignore
  6. ENH: Initial commit for circleci configuration file
  7. ENH: Added all of the included composer files
  8. ENH: Updated grumphp.yml config
  9. BUG FIX: composer 'vendor' directory is called 'inc' in this repo
  10. BUG FIX: Less complex code when updating trial levels
  11. BUG FIX: Shouldn't allow levels to be added if they're not free (when the 'all free levels are trial levels' filter is true
  12. BUG FIX: Removed unused variable
  13. BUG FIX: Added required tools and less stuff in inc/
  14. BUG FIX: Added path to commands and exclude inc
  15. BUG FIX: Added xdebug-handler code for composer
  16. BUG FIX: More linting tools for CircleCI
  17. BUG FIX: Not using vendor
  18. BUG FIX: Not using mock-function
  19. BUG FIX: Exclude all composer dependencies
  20. BUG FIX: Adding namespace so updated filter/action hooks
  21. BUG FIX: Only supporting PHP 7.2 -> 7.4
  22. BUG FIX: Using phpunit 8.5.x

2.2

  1. ENH: Added link to GitHub Issues page for the plugin
  2. ENH: Incorrect slug name for the plugin in docker environment
  3. ENH: Added PMPro PayFast gateway plugin testing to test suite
  4. BUG FIX: Fatal error due to undefined class/function

2.1

  1. ENH: Added docker environment for test purposes
  2. ENH: Using autoloader to load Utilities class

2.0

  1. ENHANCEMENT: Use the E20R Utilities module for sanitizing REQUEST variables
  2. ENHANCEMENT: Use the E20R Utilities module to handle plugin update logic
  3. ENHANCEMENT: Updated copyright notice

1.2

  1. BUG/ENHANCEMENT: Expanded to allow single-use configuration for any membership type, not just free levels.

1.1

  1. ENH/BUG: Added custom boolval() for ancient versions of PHP

1.0.3

  1. ENH: Add GPL v2 license text to source file(s)
  2. ENH: Add descriptive text to settings section on Membership Level definition page

1.0.3

  1. BUG: Didn't always load settings on page

1.0.2

  1. BUG/ENH: Make e20r_force_tls_12() pluggable
  2. ENH: Add header text to settings page

1.0.1

  1. Adding debug capabilities

1.0

  1. Initial Release of the add-on
